name: nondeviant
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
behaving in a normal and acceptable way : nondeviant children/friends/peers/spouse Increased association with non-deviant peers may help reduce disruptive behaviour across adolescence. Related word
deviant adjective
More examplesFewer examplesThe range of medical complaints reported was broad in both deviant and nondeviant children.The study found that nondeviant friends influence peers not to engage in antisocial behaviour.Women enjoying a harmonious relationship with a non-deviant husband were much more likely to show good parenting.The support of a non-deviant spouse and good living conditions in adult life provided a powerful protective effect.
